about.summary: Passionate AI/ML student with a focus on artificial intelligence, machine learning, and full-stack development. Currently pursuing a Bachelor's in AI/ML at Amity University with a strong interest in machine learning, natural language processing, and building scalable web applications. Active open-source contributor with expertise in cutting-edge AI technologies.
goals: Secure internships at top tech companies
Develop expertise in cutting-edge AI technologies

projects.title: Local LLM Integration
projects.description: A comprehensive project integrating multiple large language models including Llama3, Phi3, and Mistral for local deployment and experimentation. Features model comparison, performance benchmarking, and API integration capabilities.
projects.impact: Enables local AI model experimentation and development

projects.title: Codefolio - Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Built with clean design principles and optimized for performance across all devices.

projects.title: PDF Chatbot
projects.description: An intelligent chatbot system that can process and answer questions about PDF documents. Uses natural language processing to extract information and provide contextual responses.
projects.impact: Automates document analysis and information extraction

projects.title: Screening Bot
projects.description: An automated screening system designed to streamline candidate evaluation processes. Uses AI to analyze responses and provide preliminary screening results.
projects.impact: Streamlines recruitment processes and improves efficiency

projects.title: eConsult Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: A sentiment analysis system for eConsultation platforms. Analyzes patient feedback and consultation data to provide insights into service quality and patient satisfaction.
projects.impact: Improves healthcare service quality through data analysis

projects.title: Student Voting System
projects.description: A comprehensive academic project built as part of coursework at Amity University. Features a full-fledged online election platform with real-world capabilities including login, role-based access, candidate nominations, one-person-one-vote logic, and result control.
projects.impact: Academic project demonstrating full-stack development skills with real-world features

projects.title: eConsult-Sentiment AI Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive AI-powered sentiment analysis platform designed for eConsultation modules. Features advanced sentiment analysis using RoBERTa models, text summarization with BART transformers, word cloud visualization, and comprehensive analytics dashboard for government consultation analysis.
features: Advanced sentiment analysis with RoBERTa models
Word cloud visualization and keyword extraction
CSV/Excel file upload and batch processing
GPU acceleration support for faster processing
projects.impact: Hackathon project with 42 commits, supporting government consultation analysis with advanced AI capabilities

certifications.name: Google Developer Groups (GDG) - Building Intelligent Assistants
certifications.description: Certified in Building Intelligent Assistants & Extending AI Capabilities
certifications.impact: Applied certification knowledge to build production-ready AI solutions

leadership_experience.description: Led development of university-specific applications including Amity Elections app
leadership_experience.impact: Improved student engagement through innovative technology solutions

leadership_experience.description: Active contributor with 12+ repositories showcasing diverse technical skills
leadership_experience.impact: Maintained active open-source presence with collaborative development

innovation_showcase.innovation: Government consultation analysis using advanced AI

innovation_showcase.impact: Enables local AI experimentation and development

community_impact.description: Built comprehensive election platform for university

ambassador_vision.mission: Empower students to leverage AI for social impact and innovation
goals: Build bridges between academia and industry
Promote diversity and inclusion in tech
ambassador_vision.why_google: Google's commitment to democratizing AI aligns perfectly with my mission to make technology accessible to all students
ambassador_vision.unique_value: Combination of technical expertise, community leadership, and passion for student empowerment

achievements.title: eConsult-Sentiment AI Platform - Hackathon Project
achievements.description: Developed a comprehensive AI-powered sentiment analysis platform for eConsultation modules during a hackathon. Features advanced sentiment analysis using RoBERTa models, text summarization with BART, word cloud visualization, and comprehensive analytics dashboard.
achievements.impact: Built a complete AI platform with 42 commits, supporting CSV/Excel uploads, batch processing, GPU acceleration, and multi-format exports for government consultation analysis

achievements.title: AI-Powered PDF Chatbot Project
achievements.description: Developed a sophisticated PDF Chatbot that allows users to upload PDFs and ask intelligent questions about their content. Features Llama 3.1 running locally with Ollama, Streamlit frontend, and Flask backend for a smooth, interactive experience.
achievements.impact: Created a private, lightweight, and powerful AI solution that runs 100% locally using Python, Flask, Streamlit, Ollama, Llama 3.1, and PyPDF2

achievements.title: Student Voting System - Academic Project
achievements.description: Built a comprehensive Student Voting System as part of coursework at Amity University. Implemented a full-fledged online election platform with real-world features including login, role-based access, candidate nominations, one-person-one-vote logic, and result control.
achievements.impact: Developed complete voting system with FastAPI, MySQL, and Tailwind CSS featuring session-based auth, role management, file uploads, and responsive UI

achievements.title: AI/ML Project Developer
achievements.description: Developed multiple AI/ML projects including Local LLM integration with LLaMA3, Phi3, and Mistral models, demonstrating expertise in large language model deployment and experimentation.
achievements.impact: Successfully integrated multiple LLM models for local deployment and experimentation

achievements.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
achievements.description: Created comprehensive web applications including Codefolio portfolio website, election management systems, and interactive web interfaces using modern web technologies.
achievements.impact: Built multiple production-ready web applications with responsive design

achievements.title: Open Source Contributor
achievements.description: Active contributor to open-source projects with 12+ repositories on GitHub, showcasing diverse technical skills and commitment to collaborative development.
achievements.impact: Maintained active open-source presence with diverse project portfolio

experience.title: AI/ML Project Developer
experience.description: Developing advanced AI/ML projects including Local LLM integration, sentiment analysis systems, and intelligent automation solutions. Focus on practical applications of machine learning and natural language processing.

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
experience.description: Creating comprehensive web applications including portfolio websites, election management systems, and interactive web interfaces. Specializing in responsive design and user experience optimization.

experience.title: Data Science & Analytics Researcher
experience.description: Conducting data analysis projects including sentiment analysis for healthcare applications, PDF document processing, and statistical analysis using R programming. Focus on extracting meaningful insights from complex datasets.
